name: Trials 64
description:
This is my submission to  the Retro Game Jam! A jam where you had to remake a game, as though it came out on a retro console. For my game, I decided to recreate Trials HD as though it came out on the N64. 

To achieve this, I forced the resolution down to that of the N64, and tried to kep everything as low poly as possible!

Note:

The game hasn't converted to WebGL as well as I had hoped, so if you intend to play the game through, I advise that you download the Windows version to improve the overall quality of life.

Controls: W/SDriveA/DLeanEscapeReturn to menu

Be sure to leave a rating on the jam page after you've played!

Links:
